name: The Sims 2
description:
This installer uses D9VK and adds certain mods to fix issues with the game.
It is made for the Ultimate Collection version from Origin.
notes: IMPORTANT: READ THE MANUAL AND INSTALL DEPENDENCIES! See https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Game:-The-Sims-2 - The game will fail to launch with Origin-In-Game enabled. Please disable it in Origin's preferences to launch The Sims 2. - For support, contact @Tannis Root on Linux Gamers Group server.
content:
files:
- d9vk:
    filename: d9vk-master.b25eaf65e7731d42263b78d091de672cdc791e05.zip
    url: https://git.froggi.es/joshua/d9vk/-/jobs/750/artifacts/download
- fixes: https://github.com/tannisroot/installer-fixes/raw/master/sims2_fixes.tar.xz
- origin: https://origin-a.akamaihd.net/Origin-Client-Download/origin/legacy/OriginThinSetup.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Origin/Origin.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine Prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: d9vk
- copy:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/dxvk/d9vk-b25eaf65/
    src: $CACHE/dxvk-release/
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    description: Installing dependencies...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Disabling crash dialogs...
    key: ShowCrashDialog
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\WineDbg
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: 0
- task:
    description: Setting version to xp...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: winxp
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2013
    description: Installing Vcrun 2013
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    description: Installing Vcrun 2010
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- extract:
    dst: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/My Documents/EA Games/The Sims\u2122 2 Ultimate\
      \ Collection/Downloads"
    file: fixes
- write_file:
    content: boolprop useshaders true
    file: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/My Documents/EA Games/The Sims\u2122 2 Ultimate\
      \ Collection/Config/userstartup.cheat"
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Origin...
    exclude_processes: Origin.exe OriginClientService.exe
    executable: origin
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: 1
wine:
  dxvk_version: d9vk-b25eaf65
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
